referral_text: The essence of reLove referral system
Where abundance is born through mutual support
You receive a personal link - a key to creating your circle of like-minded people.

By inviting new people through your link, you form a community of members of your circle, united by the values of reLove. By following your link, a person receives a 5% discount on services in the 'Community Events' section
10% from payments for reLove products by members of your circle (first level)
+5% from payments by those who were attracted by members of your circle (second level)
Used to pay up to 50% of reLove events (excluding partner services)
Transferred to card (when reaching minimum amount of 5000 rubles)
